searchableProductInfo.title: PS1 Extra Large leather satchel
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Proenza Schouler updates fashion's most coveted bag with this sensational neon-red leather design. Roomy, luxe and instantly identifiable, this sleek satchel will instantly cement your style status - set off the bold hue with muted tones and metallic accessories.Shown here with: MICHAEL Michael Kors top, Kain top, Eddie Borgo bracelet and bracelet, Alyssa Norton bracelet, Dominic Jones ring, Alexander McQueen bracelet, Aur√©lie Bidermann bracelet and ring, Current/Elliot jeans, Burberry Prorsum shoes.
